comments.body:
You can trim this down with:

`Try(columnOf(pos.end)).recover { case _: ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException => startColumn }.toOption`

Or, if you prefer:

```scala
import scala.util.control.Exception.catching

private val aioobeCatcher = catching(classOf[ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException])

Some(aioobeCatcher.withApply(_ => startColumn)(columnOf(pos.end)))
```
Maybe it's premature optimization, but I feel like delegating reporter should avoid allocation?
Yep, that sounds like premature optimization to me.
